Instruction: Cook rice noodles according to package directions. Rinse with cold water and drain.
Cut tofu into small cubes. Press between paper towels to remove excess water.
In a small bowl, combine peanut butter, soy sauce, rice vinegar, tamarind paste, sugar, and chili garlic sauce. Set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add tofu and cook until golden brown.
Slice green onions and mince garlic.
Add green onions and garlic to the skillet. Cook for 30 seconds, or until fragrant.
Add cooked rice noodles and pad thai sauce to the skillet. Toss to coat.
Add bean sprouts and cook for 1 minute, or until heated through.
Serve topped with crushed peanuts and lime wedges.
